price: እናንተ ያመናችሁ ሆይ! አራጣን የተነባበሩ እጥፎች ሲኾኑ አትብሉ፡፡ ትድኑም ዘንድ አላህን ፍሩ፡፡
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَأۡكُلُواْ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓاْ أَضۡعَٰفٗا مُّضَٰعَفَةٗۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takulū al-riba aḍʿāfan muḍāʿafatan wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
